name: Devious Wordle
description:
Wordle... but with a twist...

3 game modes: Vanilla, Quirky, Devious

In this spin on Wordle, devious guesses will incorrectly color only one square. This adds an extra layer of strategy and forces you to think so hard that your brain melts.

Built in 5 hours, for some reason. Little side project made for a friend.

Enjoy :)
